hero.title: Welcome to myWebsite
hero.subtitle: Discover our free content and join our community for exclusive member resources.

articles.title: Latest Articles
articles.description: Stay up to date with our latest insights, tutorials, and industry news. Fresh content published weekly.
articles.content: Our team of experts regularly publishes in-depth articles covering the latest trends in technology, design, and business. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced professional, you'll find valuable content here.

guides.title: Getting Started Guides
guides.description: Step-by-step guides to help you get started with our platform and make the most of available resources.
guides.content: From your first steps to advanced techniques, our comprehensive guides walk you through everything you need to know. Each guide includes practical examples and real-world applications.

community.title: Community
community.description: Join our growing community of professionals and enthusiasts sharing knowledge and experiences.
community.content: Connect with like-minded individuals, participate in discussions, and share your own expertise. Our community is built on collaboration and mutual support.

MembersPage.title: Members Area
MembersPage.subtitle: Welcome back! Here's your exclusive content.

premium.title: Premium Article: Advanced Strategies
premium.description: Deep dive into advanced strategies that will take your skills to the next level. This exclusive content is only available to registered members.

tutorial.title: Exclusive Tutorial: Building for Scale
tutorial.description: Learn how to build scalable systems with our step-by-step exclusive tutorial series. Includes code examples and best practices.

dashboard.title: Member Dashboard
dashboard.description: Track your progress, manage your profile, and access personalized recommendations based on your interests.

webinar.title: Upcoming Webinar: Industry Trends 2026
webinar.description: Join our live webinar on March 15th where industry experts discuss emerging trends and their impact on the market.

login.title: Sign In
login.subtitle: Welcome back! Please sign in to your account.
login.error: Invalid email or password. Please make sure your email is verified.

register.title: Create Account
register.subtitle: Join myWebsite to access exclusive member content.
register.name: Full Name
register.success: Account created! Please check your email to verify your account.
register.errorEmail: An account with this email already exists.
register.errorGeneral: Something went wrong. Please try again.

forgotPassword.title: Reset Password
forgotPassword.subtitle: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
forgotPassword.success: If an account with that email exists, we've sent a password reset link.

resetPassword.title: Set New Password
resetPassword.subtitle: Enter your new password below.
resetPassword.success: Password reset successfully! You can now sign in with your new password.
resetPassword.error: Invalid or expired reset link. Please request a new one.

verifyEmail.title: Email Verification
verifyEmail.success: Your email has been verified successfully! You can now sign in.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: Despite careful content control, we assume no liability for the content of external links. The content of the linked pages is the sole responsibility of their operators.

Footer.description: Your gateway to exclusive content and resources.
